name: Adorable Baby Doll
shortDescription: This adorable baby doll is perfect for nurturing playtime and imaginative fun!

name: Cuddly Soft Doll
shortDescription: Snuggle up with this cuddly soft baby doll that's great for comforting play!

name: Interactive Baby Doll
shortDescription: This interactive baby doll can babble, giggle, and respond to your child's touch!

name: Sleepy Time Doll
shortDescription: Get ready for bedtime routines with this adorable sleepy time baby doll!

name: Bath Time Doll
shortDescription: Make bath time fun with this water-friendly baby doll that comes with bathing accessories!

name: Soft Body Doll
shortDescription: This soft-bodied baby doll is huggable and perfect for gentle playtime!

name: Dress-Up Doll Set
shortDescription: Let your child's creativity shine with this dress-up doll set that includes different outfits and accessories!

name: Baby Boy Doll
shortDescription: Introduce diversity to your child's doll collection with this adorable baby boy doll!

name: Barbie Fashionista Doll
shortDescription: This Barbie Fashionista doll is ready to showcase the latest trends and inspire imaginative play!

name: Barbie Dreamtopia Princess Doll
shortDescription: Let your child's imagination soar with this Barbie Dreamtopia princess doll that's perfect for magical adventures!

name: Barbie Career Doll Set
shortDescription: Inspire dreams and ambitions with this Barbie career doll set featuring different professions and accessories!

name: Barbie Mermaid Doll
shortDescription: Dive into underwater adventures with this beautiful Barbie mermaid doll that's perfect for imaginative play!

name: Barbie Fashion Design Doll
shortDescription: Unleash creativity with this Barbie fashion design doll that allows your child to create their own unique outfits!

name: Barbie Ballerina Doll
shortDescription: Let your child explore the world of dance and ballet with this beautiful Barbie ballerina doll!

name: Barbie Glam Convertible Car
shortDescription: Take Barbie on stylish adventures with this glamorous convertible car that's perfect for imaginative play!

name: Barbie Superhero Doll
shortDescription: Join Barbie on epic superhero missions with this powerful and inspiring Barbie superhero doll!

name: American Girl Doll - Emily
shortDescription: Meet Emily, an American Girl doll from the historical BeForever collection, representing the World War II era.

name: American Girl Doll - Grace
shortDescription: Discover the story of Grace, an American Girl doll who follows her passion for baking and opens her own French bakery.

name: American Girl Doll - Isabelle
shortDescription: Meet Isabelle, an American Girl doll who loves ballet and dreams of becoming a professional dancer.

name: American Girl Doll - Samantha
shortDescription: Step back in time with Samantha, an American Girl doll from the historical BeForever collection, set in the early 1900s.

name: American Girl Doll - Kit
shortDescription: Experience the Great Depression era with Kit, an American Girl doll who loves writing and storytelling.

name: American Girl Doll - Maryellen
shortDescription: Travel back to the 1950s with Maryellen, an American Girl doll who is passionate about the world of diners and rock 'n' roll.

name: American Girl Doll - Addy
shortDescription: Discover the story of Addy, an American Girl doll who escapes from slavery during the Civil War era.
